name: Get Up!
description:
... and walk through the woods A game about picking yourself up when you're feeling down

Credit to the great artists who made Creative Commons assets used in this game:

Forest art: https://ansimuz.itch.io/patreons-top-down-collection Character art: https://legnops.itch.io/red-hood-character Dog art:  https://benvictus.itch.io/pixel-dogs/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNjQ1NzIyNDAxLCJpZCI6NTgyOTU0fQ%3d%3d.IJGZ1R7dMfjCbJJIZUjjR3l5h4w%3d Spring time sounds: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FAxr2TwLwFU Rain sounds: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SsI_iPBGjt0 Cursor art: https://lintnaya.itch.io/roret-cursor
